answerText: The Piazza Tales[10] Herman Melville's Piazza Tales also contains this novella in which the title character, a copyist for a law firm, responds to any requests made to him with the phrase "I would prefer not to."
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 5 | 8 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One story in this collection sees a man attempt to sell long copper rods during a thunderstorm, while another work in it deals with Delano's discovery of a slave rebellion upon the ship San Dominick. For 10 points each: [10] Name this collection containing the short story "The Lightning-Rod Man" as well as the novella Benito Cereno. It was published ten years after its author's first novel, Typee.
